entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 a.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
